unnormalised: **Solar Rooftop Subsidies Shine Brighter Than Diwali Diyas!**
normalised: Solar Rooftop Subsidies Shine Brighter Than Diwali Diyas!

unnormalised: Good news, folks! Thinking of going solar on your roof? The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE) just announced a sweet deal: boosted subsidies for rooftop solar installations. Forget shelling out a fortune – now you can save big!
normalised: Good news, folks! Thinking of going solar on your roof? The Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (M N R E) just announced a sweet deal: boosted subsidies for rooftop solar installations. Forget shelling out a fortune – now you can save big!

unnormalised: Under the updated scheme, homeowners in cities like Chennai and Mumbai can get up to 40% subsidy for systems up to 3kW. Even larger systems get a decent chunk of change back. Imagine, powering your ACs and watching cricket matches guilt-free!
normalised: Under the updated scheme, homeowners in cities like Chennai and Mumbai can get up to forty percent subsidy for systems up to three kilowatt. Even larger systems get a decent chunk of change back. Imagine, powering your A C s and watching cricket matches guilt-free!

unnormalised: Mr. Sharma from Delhi, a biryani enthusiast, says he's finally taking the plunge after years of contemplation. "With these subsidies, it's a no-brainer! Cheaper electricity and a greener footprint – what's not to love?"
normalised: Mister Sharma from Delhi, a biryani enthusiast, says he's finally taking the plunge after years of contemplation. "With these subsidies, it's a no-brainer! Cheaper electricity and a greener footprint – what's not to love?"

unnormalised: Officials at IIT Madras are optimistic about the initiative. "This will significantly boost solar adoption across India, especially in Tier-2 and Tier-3 cities," Dr. Patel stated.
normalised: Officials at I I T Madras are optimistic about the initiative. "This will significantly boost solar adoption across India, especially in Tier-two and Tier-three cities," Doctor Patel stated.

unnormalised: Expect increased demand for solar panels in the coming months. Get your installations done before everyone else jumps on the bandwagon! Estimated cost savings can reach Rs. 30,000 per year. Go green, save green!
normalised: Expect increased demand for solar panels in the coming months. Get your installations done before everyone else jumps on the bandwagon! Estimated cost savings can reach rupee thirty thousand per year. Go green, save green!
